    • Uses of VariableInstanceEntity in com.wegas.core.persistence.variable.statemachine

      Subclasses of VariableInstanceEntity in com.wegas.core.persistence.variable.statemachine 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StateMachineInstanceEntity 
      class  TriggerInstanceEntity
      Trigger: S1->(T1)->S2, S2 final (oneShot)
      S1->(T1)->S2->(!T1)->S1 (opposedTrigger)
      else S1->(T1)->S1 (loop).
      OneShot and OpposedTrigger are exclusive.
